subject: Soccer
Sports Injuries
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Morgan, the United States’ top forward, has not played a competitive game since sustaining a bone bruise in early April, and deciding whether to play her is a difficult puzzle for Coach Jill Ellis.
snippet: Morgan, the United States’ top forward, has not played a competitive game since sustaining a bone bruise in early April, and deciding whether to play her is a difficult puzzle for Coach Jill Ellis.
